docs.title: Introduction about Itomori
docs.text:
Itomiri is a quick short note taking app. Which is blazingly fast, simple, easy to use, works everywhere, ultra minimalistic. This the docs section of Itomori, it is not the website, it is the official website. This official documentation is open source, anyone can contribute to it! Thanks for using Itomori. Have a nice day.

Itomori has an interactive CLI , which helps you to use Itomori, more efficiently!

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
With uv (Windows, Mac OS, Linux, others) :

Pre-requirements : Python 3.13 installed , uv latest version installed\

Run this command to install

uv tool install git+https://github.com/TheAhumMaitra/Itomori.git

Done!

Now type Itomori in terminal to launch!

With pip (Windows, Mac OS, Linux, others) :

Pre-requirements : Python 3.13 installed , pip latest version installed\

Run this command to install

pip install Itomori

Done!

Now type Itomori in terminal to launch!

docs.title: Itomori's Cool CLI
docs.text:
Itomori's CLI is cool and helpful!

Some helpful commands :

1 : -h or --help:

Run - Itomori -h or Itomori --help to see a brief info's about all commands.

2 : --version:

Run - Itomori --version to see a current version of Itomori, you are using!.

3 : --update:

Run - Itomori --update to see update Itomori automatically with uv.

4 : --license:

Run - Itomori --license to see the short license preview.

5 : --fullLicense:

Run - Itomori --fullLicense to see the full license text.

6 : --uninstall:

Run - Itomori --version to uninstall Itomori.

docs.title: Create your first Note in Itomori
docs.text:
Welcome to Itomori. To create your first Note, follow these easy and simple steps:

  1. Open Itomori App
  2. Press your keyboard's Tab key to go to the Note Input field. You can also use your Mouse.
  3. Write your note
  4. Press Enter key from your keyboard

**Done! Congratulations you created your first note using Itomori.

docs.title: View your all saved notes
docs.text:
To view your all saved notes, follow these steps:

  1. Open Itomori App
  2. Press n key from your keyboard to view all your notes.
  3. Now you can view a beautiful table of yours saved notes

Done!

docs.title: View Itomori's version
docs.text:
To view Itomori's current version from CLI is easy

Follow these steps (CLI Way) : 1. Open your terminal or command prompt 2. Run this command to view current Itomori version :- Itomori --version 3. Now it should provide the current Itomori version

Done !

Or, if you prefer to view the Itomori's current version from the App

Follow these steps (TUI way):

  1. Open Itomori App
  2. Press v key from your keyboard , now you should see the about page, which include's all the About info , included version

Done!
